typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> odsDB
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		Surrogate as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> intergrationDB
odsDB derive(IsActive = 1) ~> addingisactive
odsDB, Select3 lookup(PersonID == SQL_PersonID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_PersonID)) ~> existingRow
Select4 derive(SQL_IsActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
intergrationDB select(mapColumn(
		SQL_PersonID = PersonID,
		SQL_FullName = FullName,
		SQL_PreferredName = PreferredName,
		SQL_SearchName = SearchName,
		SQL_IsPermittedToLogon = IsPermittedToLogon,
		SQL_LogonName = LogonName,
		SQL_IsExternalLogonProvider = IsExternalLogonProvider,
		SQL_HashedPassword = HashedPassword,
		SQL_IsSystemUser = IsSystemUser,
		SQL_IsEmployee = IsEmployee,
		SQL_IsSalesperson = IsSalesperson,
		SQL_UserPreferences = UserPreferences,
		SQL_PhoneNumber = PhoneNumber,
		SQL_FaxNumber = FaxNumber,
		SQL_EmailAddress = EmailAddress,
		SQL_Photo = Photo,
		SQL_CustomFields = CustomFields,
		SQL_OtherLanguages = OtherLanguages,
		SQL_LastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		SQL_ValidFrom = ValidFrom,
		SQL_ValidTo = ValidTo,
		SQL_IsActive = IsActive,
		Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
existingRow select(mapColumn(
		SQL_PersonID,
		SQL_FullName,
		SQL_PreferredName,
		SQL_SearchName,
		SQL_IsPermittedToLogon,
		SQL_LogonName,
		SQL_IsExternalLogonProvider,
		SQL_HashedPassword,
		SQL_IsSystemUser,
		SQL_IsEmployee,
		SQL_IsSalesperson,
		SQL_UserPreferences,
		SQL_PhoneNumber,
		SQL_FaxNumber,
		SQL_EmailAddress,
		SQL_Photo,
		SQL_CustomFields,
		SQL_OtherLanguages,
		SQL_LastEditedBy,
		SQL_ValidFrom,
		SQL_ValidTo,
		SQL_IsActive,
		SQL_Surrogate = Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
addingisactive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> intergrationPlusAct
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		Surrogate as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Surrogate'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PersonID = SQL_PersonID,
		FullName = SQL_FullName,
		PreferredName = SQL_PreferredName,
		SearchName = SQL_SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon = SQL_IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName = SQL_LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider = SQL_IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword = SQL_HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser = SQL_IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee = SQL_IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson = SQL_IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences = SQL_UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber = SQL_PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber = SQL_FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress = SQL_EmailAddress,
		Photo = SQL_Photo,
		CustomFields = SQL_CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages = SQL_OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy = SQL_LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = SQL_ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = SQL_ValidTo,
		IsActive = SQL_IsActive,
		Surrogate = SQL_Surrogate
	)) ~> sink1
